page.title: 08USK CASTLE
page.content: The castle is situated on a hill to which a path from Porthycarne Rd. leads.The castle was commenced in 1120, the{NORMAN KEEP}in 1173 and the {GATEHOUSE}in 1368. The three main points are the{SCARP (The right-hand portion of the ditch), the{COUNTERSCARP}(The left-hand portion of the ditch) and at the top of the SCARP a big flat area surrounded by ditches, the{HALF-MOON {BARBICAN.} The original entrance was probablly near the{NORTH TOWER}where there is large defensive earthwork,it is now on the East side,facing the town. At the North of the BARBICAN was the battle of{PWLL MELYN}at the end of the rebellion of{OWAIN GLYNDWR.}It was the end of feuding between the English and the Welsh. It is now owned by the HUMPREY'S,private visits may be made.
